message.raw:
Updated gyroscopic torque calculations.  Fixed some Windows compiler issues/warnings.

The previous gyroscopic calculations included externally applied torque as though it
were already part of the angular velocity.  This caused problems.  The external
torques are now applied after the gyroscopic computations.

The symbol NAN (previously used in ray.cpp) is not defined in visual studio.

message:
Updated gyroscopic torque calculations.  Fixed some Windows compiler issues/warnings.

The previous gyroscopic calculations included externally applied torque as though it
were already part of the angular velocity.  This caused problems.  The external
torques are now applied after the gyroscopic computations.

The symbol NAN (previously used in ray.cpp) is not defined in visual studio.
